website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced pair of decent 800 mAh battery packs and a charge station.
pros: These battery packs can be charged separately or while attached to the controller
If you're playing solo, you can easily swap out a used battery pack for the fully charged one
of playtime, and a green LED indicates when the battery packs are fully charged
cons: Relatively short playtime compared to other battery packs

customer_reviews.title: Works Barely Okay... When It’s Actually Working
customer_reviews.text: Got this in October, so I’ve only had it for 3 months and the base barely works. If you so much as push the charger in a little too far it doesn’t work. If you move the cord around at all it doesn’t work. The only thing keeping me from giving it 1 star is that it works really well when it actually decides to work. UPDATE: Originally gave a 2 star rating because it barely worked kinda. Now it’s not working at all. After 3 months of sitting in one location, never dropped or damaged, it no longer works. I’d say this is a HARD PASS. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis M.

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: This charger worked perfectly when I first got it. After a few weeks I noticed a decrease in battery life, eventually that decrease was severe. I had to use multiple battery packs a day if I decided to game for more than 4 hours. The charger itself stopped working as intended as well. I have to angle the batteries on the base for them to even charge. If you’re considering purchasing this just spend a little more on a better one. I’m going to have to buy another charger, so buying the cheap one has back fired.
customer_reviews.author: Harlin

customer_reviews.title: Great charger and solid alternative to aa battery packs.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks good sitting atop the console. The battery packs hold charge for roughly 12-15 hours of usage, not counting controller idle timing so probably 8-10 hours if you are playing really intensely. If you have a second controller you would have 0 down time and only have to swap the battery if one reaches the end of its cycle decay several years in the future unless it is physically damaged. Well worth it to pick up this unit and a secondary controller.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not "Long Lasting"
customer_reviews.text: The product description says it'll last "up to 35 hours" and that other brands will only last about "6-8 hours". They must have accidentally sent me the "other brand" because these batteries only last 4-6 hours from a full charge. It's not because the batteries are old, I've only had this product for a few days. I've tried a different controller and both batteries, same result. My Ni-Mh rechargeable AAs last just as long and supply more power and charge faster. The only benefit to this is the docking station and it's faster to swap out batteries as opposed to standard AAs.
customer_reviews.author: RCKT

customer_reviews.title: Red light fully charged/green light charging?
customer_reviews.text: The size of the base is perfect, not bulky yet not flimsy. The battery life seem to last for hours (haven't had a chance to run them dead yet). My main issue is the led light around the base. The light constantly stay red until I take the controllers off the dock. I reseat the controllers, push down on them, lift them up, and repeat but the result stays the same. My on-screen battery life icon shows a full battery so I'm assuming that the dock's lights are reverse where red is fully charged and green is charging. All in all, it's ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: As an gamer I say this is a must have for anyone who hate trying to struggle with running out of batteries and when all fails using a charge cord just to play. I roughly play ten hours a day and this is a must have, one battery charge lasts six to seven hours and when I’m low I can easily swap and get back to gaming. I especially like the led charge, red for charging and green when fully charged, some units I’ve seen don’t have that so your left with questions if it’s done.
customer_reviews.author: ██████████████

customer_reviews.title: Loose battery, uncertain if it charges, albeit ascetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.text: I knew the second I put the batteries in that this was a less than desired product. The batteries laid somewhat loose onto the controllers. I placed both batteries to charge on the base and went about my day. I came back to find only one of the batteries fully charged. The back didn’t charge at all it seems. Not a product I would recommend. I would return it had I not thrown away the box.
customer_reviews.author: Vq

customer_reviews.title: Only one battery works and has sub par performance
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t charge well at all. One of the battery packs doesn’t work barely at all. After a “full charge” it only actually powers the controller for an hour, two tops. (Full disclosure, this battery pack actually never even fully completes charging- it has literally sat on the dock for days and still shows as red). The other one that does charge properly doesn’t power the remote for as long as desired.
customer_reviews.author: Beau W.

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I went so long without this in my life! Gone are the days of the children deteriorating my battery supply, whining about not getting the batteries in correctly or groaning when the batteries do die! They just pop the controllers onto the charger when they're done playing and voila! They're ready to go time after time. An indicator light wraps around the base so it's easy to see of the controllers are dead or ready. Highly suggested purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Great Seller!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is working great. I just bought a new Xbox One and needed a second charging unit. So far, this one is working out great. The battery packs even work on my other unit of a different brand. Delivery was fast. Great product for a great price. Better yet, the seller sent an email offering support if there were any problems. Very refreshing after a recent bad experience with a different Amazon seller! Highly recommend for both product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and this is my 3rd set.
customer_reviews.text: These have been great. I bought two of these for my kids xbox one's a couple years ago and so i am buying my 3rd one. We do have 3 xboxes. I like that you can charge the battery with the pack still on the controller. You can also plug the pack in while playing if your battery charge happens to run out. This hold a good charge and seem very reliable. Great Value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Good product just read everything online!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a Christmas present and it’s nice. Works well so overall no complaints there. However when I was looking at the product online I guess I didn’t read the part where it is a usb charging station and not a plug in one. The charge does last for a while which naturally is why one would buy a rechargeable station.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: cross your fingers you get a unit with out issues
customer_reviews.text: Not a happy customer!! battery doesnt last very long at all not even close to the specs. the charging cradle displays full battery when batteries or controller is on cradle when in fact they are not. just all around not a good product buyer BEWARE you get what you pay for!!! its a shame because i went off a recommendation of a friend.maybe i recieved a defected unit both both batteries are the same short life span and cradle indicates full batteries on both charging slots . and lastly one of the batteries does not fit tight in my controller its loose and wiggles in the back of the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Takes a minute to set in charger properly
customer_reviews.text: It charges fast and the batteries seem to last at least 8 hours.(That's the longest I played in one setting) The lights are a little distracting and it takes some shifting around to set the controller in properly to charge. It would have been nice to be able to charge the batteries without the controller, since I only have 1 controller and wanted to charge the spare battery, just in case. But overall,I would give 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hafler

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass!
customer_reviews.text: Pure garbage. Boasts about long gameplay time and easy docking. Neither one of those are true. I've had this for a week now and cant get the packs to even show up as fully charged even though the green light says they are. And when I go to use them? I get about 6 hours of play before the system tells me the battery life is low.
customer_reviews.author: T&K

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere near 35 hours
customer_reviews.text: these are alright. they last nowhere near 35 hours as advertised, the charging base is touchy, seems like the contacts on the base wear by minimal use and i can see how some other's have stopped working. i will be looking for others once these finally crap out. these have no other ways of charging other than their base, and that will be unfortunate when it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Kuzon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 8 year olds xbox1 and the durability and battery life they have is awesome. My son rearily charged them (as it’s me that places them on the stands at night) he’s drops his controller a lot and the battery packs stay put and there’s been no cracks or chips in the pack (which has happened in the past) the stand is also very easy to use and is anestheticly pleasing next to his xbox (not that he cares about that more for me when I finish cleaning his room)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another cheap product
customer_reviews.text: After over a year and a half of use it Stopped recharging, meanwhile Xbox licenses recharger still going strong. This is just another cheap product on the amazon market
customer_reviews.author: Jaydel logrono Gagne

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.. good addition.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why we waited so long to get one of these. It was always a pain to see the Xbox report that your controller was low on batteries .. take them out .. put them in the charger .. put new ones in, etc. This system is simple to install and .. your controllers are always in one place, always charged ready for action. Well worth the money and hassle reduction.
customer_reviews.author: kbuck320

customer_reviews.title: Works well! No more Batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it should. I was having an issue with my xbox one controller (which I use for PC) constantly running out of battery life. This dock is awesome. Only owned it for a month and I've already saved money on batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Snail

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product is Great! Charges both controllers at the same time. I can also charge the battery pack without them being on the controllers. Just mount them on the charging base. My grandson loves that we don't ha ve to keep changing batteries. Tjis is a new product for us and so far it's just what we needed! I love that when I registered my products, that I got an addition 6 months warranty, so it makes the warranty good for 18 months (year and a half).
customer_reviews.author: Rita Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Battery usage is low and it should be higher.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of the unit. I connected it to a power source and started to charge the batteries right away. The only issue I had was the life of the first charge. It seemed that the battery quit after several hours or use. No problem, I will just try it for a few times. if the problem persists then I will contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse L. Moreland Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked bend package delivered.
customer_reviews.text: Box came one sided totally cracked n bend. When u order a electronics u expect a nice n clean well maintained box. Very disappointed with the delivery. Now will update my review after a week with the product quality. Gave 2 start because the inside material was ok n fine. Lets wait n see the product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kahmed

customer_reviews.title: Took time
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, however was difficult to insert into dock when new. Now that it's broken in it docks easily. Note: since controller docks upside down in an almost vertical position clearance is a factor when choosing a location to place it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mowry

customer_reviews.title: Works, but...
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended sort of, my only complaint and I'm not sure if I'm the only one with this issues, is that the detachable batteries quickly run out of battery within maybe 8-10 hours of gameplay. This bothers me because the description says up to 35 hours. Luckily it comes with two batteries and I have two controllers so after one battery dies I just change it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: More problems then solutions.
customer_reviews.text: Too many problems with controllers disconnecting when they still have power, controllers will be on but not connected to xbox, batteries connectors came corroded, batteries come out at the slightest bumps, all in all this product sucks and has caused more problems then solutions. Would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Positives they hold a charge for a long time nice bright LED lighting that goes from red when charging to orange when almost charged to green when fully charged Negatives loose fitting in controller will fall out if controller is turned upside down ( Xbox one x ) Take a long time to charge
customer_reviews.author: Palmbch

customer_reviews.title: great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Works great,I leave my controller docked when jot in use and frequently play for a few hours straight and never had a low battery warning. My only minor complain is the LED on the side are super bright and always stay on with a controller on the dock even if fully charged
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: This charging stand for the Xbox one/ one s controllers works to perfection. It helps that it comes with the rechargeable batteries for the controller makes it a nice package to buy. No complaints here. The cost of the product is affordable and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it and so do I. He kept on taking batteries from my remotes This made it easier for him to charge his devices and easier for me to stop buying batteries. Great idea. Every parent / grandparent should buy one
customer_reviews.author: kasey

customer_reviews.title: Just my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Great for what it's needed for, battery life overall is great, the battery's alone are only good for a year, so plan to order more battery's to have. Charging is about 5+hrs from dead, and the glowing light from dock is obnoxiously bright 😒
customer_reviews.author: Just My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper then batteries in the long run
customer_reviews.text: Usually last about 20 hours between charges. So much easier and convenient, not to mention better for the environment then continuously changing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: It takes forever to charge the controllers. I think it takes longer to charge them than it does to kill the battery on them. The battery does not last long at all before it’s drained. I have better durability with regular old batteries. I might just end up buying regular rechargeable batteries from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Lore

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research for these type of charger for my Xbox. I was tired of buying batteries and with as much as I play, it only made sense to get rechargeable batteries. I looked at several brands for a long time before I went with Sliq. The product has worked flawlessly. I was a little concerned at first about the connectivity to one of the chargers, but after about leaving on for the duration of the day while at work, I came home to both controllers being fully charged. I have played for hours on end and haven't had an issue once with my main controller. Highly recommend these rechargeable batteries and dock. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My son's controller wasn't keeping a charge for long, so I ordered these batteries. They arrived and were easy to switch out and set up. The charging is super easy to place on the station each night and they stay charged all day for him!
customer_reviews.author: BerryKix

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found a good charger for my Xbox controllers. This charger holds and stores my controllers securely and has a clear red and green indication that controller is connected and charging.
customer_reviews.author: Elroy Bethell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use WITH the Chat-pad still Installed.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this one as I like to use the chat-pad and I do not want to remove it when charging. This base charger has a solid feel and holds the controllers easily. Quality product and packaging. PLEASE make one like this for the XBOX 360 Controllers!
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good device
customer_reviews.text: Device came as shown works well really don't have any complaints it's worth the money
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This charger works much better than my previous (more costly) one. Plus, it shuts off charging once complete, meaning you can leave the controllers in the charger without causing damage. A+
customer_reviews.author: Andreas J. Munsey

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son plays fortnite in his free time and we were going thru AA batteries like crazy was costing a fortune! This works great! He plays for a while before needing to charge and It was affordable and saves me money on batteries. I reccomend anyone who has teenage gamers get this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jenna Grenier

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is no wheres near 35 hours!
customer_reviews.text: I get about 3 hours tops out of each rechargeable pack! Also it can be tricky to get the pack to sit correctly on the charger in order to charge! I either got defects or this product is not what they described it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Nick3184

customer_reviews.title: Non existent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with corrosion on battery contacts . Sent customer service an email with my issue no response .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life but works well
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn’t last long but it is very easy to dock and have ready. The fact that the other battery can charge independently is nice. Still saves from using tons of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle's Uncle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really great. One of my back clips, as shown in a picture by someone else, was broken on arrival. I managed to be able to snap it on the controller still. Other than that, a really great charging station. Good for the price and love how it lights up. Chord is short but i just plug it into the usb port of my xbox one.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly like you'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should, replaces standard AA batteries. It's easy to use and let's you know, through red/green color, the status of your charge. My only complaint is that while there's no chance of battery pack falling out, it doesn't click into place, it slides in and out without much resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Michelangelo

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery pack
customer_reviews.text: The battery fits my controller perfectly, its a little iffy when it comes to getting it to sit right on the charging dock but it does work once you get it and charges pretty fast. The only issue I have is that it comes with 2 batteries which is great, but one of my batteries doesn't charge at all. Not alone, or with it in the controller. I can't seem to figure out how to contact the company, Sliq Gaming Inc. If someone can help me with that or if they can respond here that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Hasson

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, compact, great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek look. It is really compact and the controllers fit very snug. Charges fast and battery life lasts. I can play 2 to 3 days for hours at a time before battery dies. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Cangelosi

customer_reviews.title: Solid Connection
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to position the controllers so they charge reliably. No fidgeting around required, as with some other brands. It just works as you would want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy (WA)

customer_reviews.title: My favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: In a space that is full of similar products this one has been my favorite so far. Easy to get a connection, good looking, and great feedback with the lights so you can be confident its charging. Not to (or to) mention the fantastic price point.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Sliq Xbox One/One X/One S Controller Charger Station and Battery Pack
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this is you don't have to wiggle your controller to get it to start charging, you just plop it on the charging station and go. Another thing I like this is the battery pack attaches easy to the controller. I would definitely recommend this to my gamer friends.
customer_reviews.author: Razorback500

customer_reviews.title: Mom recommended. Great buy no more buying batteries in bulk for my kids Xbox controllers.
customer_reviews.text: I was sick. Of throwing money away for batteries for my son's controller. This was an affordable godsend. Easy to use and lights to indicate charged or not. This mom highly recommends this product. Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.author: Tina Ann McRee

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a few days. So far so good. We do have to change the battery pack out evey other day. To be fair, we are playing alot and it's a game where the controler rumbles alot.
customer_reviews.author: amanda weyrum

customer_reviews.title: This product will pay for itself in no time.
customer_reviews.text: If you're an avid gamer or just use your controller frequently then you probably spend a small fortune in batteries. This product will pay for itself in no time. Good value, exactly what I expected to get. In my experience the battery life doesn't last quite as long as promised in description but my headset use may contribute to that. Satisfied overall.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve purchased; my first one lasted close to 5 years. I always keep one fully charged and they are easy to swap out on the fly, especially while playing a FPS.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged nicely and the indicator lights on the charging base are better than others I've used. Batterys seem to work pretty good and for the price it's a steal. I'll leave an update once I've used them more. As for now definitely a 5!
customer_reviews.author: Madmartigan

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use.  Very bright lights
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to tell if remote still charging. Charges quickly. Good battery life. Only had for a month so far. VERY easy to put on charger and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Defective battery and no customer support
customer_reviews.text: Item works as described, however one battery stopped holding a charge. Multiple attempts to reach customer service for warranty claims and have not been contacted.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Not sure what I was thinking but smaller than I thought but thats a good thing if space is an issue. Love that you can charge the battery without the controller.
customer_reviews.author: ZFAM

customer_reviews.title: It glows really bright
customer_reviews.text: Yes the batteries work but did I mention that the charging station glows intensely with green and red light so if you have this in your bedroom forget about sleeping unless you like to sleep with a really bright night light Update: batteries stopped charging after 3mo
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery life
customer_reviews.text: Batteries charge only to about 70% and give low battery signal after about 3 hours of use. I just got these 6/6/20 and if it stays like this, will be a return for sure
customer_reviews.author: beto castillo

customer_reviews.title: batteries won't charge
customer_reviews.text: the batteries won't charge unless connected to a controller. the weight of the controller is necessary to make contact. i was intending on using one spare battery on the charger while i use the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Led light stays on no off switch.
customer_reviews.text: The batteries work alright putting them to charge on the dock is not that easy but once it's in there it charges. I think there needs to be a off switch for the led light.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Benito

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one day
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for one day. The lights stay red all the time(meaning needs charging). Slow or no charge. Does not have an outlet plug, instead comes with a very short USB, to plug the station into your Xbox. I should have followed my instincts, and not bought a charger base, that charges the controllers seated upside down. This charging station looks like a quality products, but does not perform like one. I am definitely returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgit

customer_reviews.title: The Battery lasted 4 months and they dont honor their 1 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and was greatly disappointed with its performance. The battery didnt last more than 4 months and then why I tried to leverage the warranty service, my emails went unanswered for almost an entire month. Dont waste your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian W.

customer_reviews.title: No more batteries
customer_reviews.text: Tired of wasting batteries? Then this bad boy is just what you order! No more constantly buying and replacing batteries. No need for another plug in the wall either this plugs right into the Xbox!
customer_reviews.author: Kilian

customer_reviews.title: Batteries dont last long at ALL and the green lights always stay on.
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. I would recommended the charging stations that have the energizer battery packs. These other battery packs are most likely cheap china junk. I think I maybe got 2-1/2 hours of game play until I had to switch battery packs. And the lights are super bright and always on, it would be better if they went off when the controllers were not plugged into it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice. Not cheap made but batteries dont stay charged very long.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor L.

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: Im kinda disappointed. They dont last very long which sucks because we have two controllers and if one of our dies then we can keep playing. Its like is forcing me to buy more of the rechargeable battery
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Good so far, fits Elite Controller
customer_reviews.text: Fits both normal and elite controller. Batteries fit well in both controllers and charging seems to work well. Will update if this changes.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Carter

customer_reviews.title: A battery pack and charger that works so good I bought a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.text: This battery pack was a replacement for an aging battery pack / rechargeable system. It was such an upgrade to the old system we bought a 2nd one for our other xbox. It holds the controller perfectly. Keeps a good charge and does exactly what is designed to do. A changing color indicates when the battery is charged, which takes the guess work out of the mix. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ring

customer_reviews.title: Does not break like many others
customer_reviews.text: I went through 3 different kinds of charging docks. This one has been the easiest to set in place and has lasted the longest. It is a quality feeling product and looks great with the light bar at bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J. Fanello

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Great charger that is well worth the money. It is not a quick charger and seems to take about half the time spent playing to recharge. Play 8 - charge 4. Charge with or without the controller = fantastic. USB only power Lights are bright, which is both good and annoying. The option to shut them off or a timer? They come on as soon as it is plugged into a usb port. Takes up very little room
customer_reviews.author: MWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Not
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn’t fit perfectly in the controller and, depending on how you hold your controller, it disconnects. I bought this a month ago and now my controller keeps turning off even when the battery is fully charged. I tried using my old batteries and it works just fine. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Son is pleased !
customer_reviews.text: Awesomeness ! Tracking was a bit off between estimated date, date of delivery after purchase and then tracking once it shipped . Ultimately, it made it in time . Works great. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Charges perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger kit. The color indicators is probably my favorite part of the whole thing. The only thing that prevented me from giving 5 stars is the controllers don’t sit very stabally. If you nudge the station slightly, then controllers will pop off. However, the batteries fit perfectly. So the simple solution is to charge the battery case without the controller! Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Myko B

customer_reviews.title: Stick to corded play.
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended but batterie packs dont feel like they click in, they are not firm. The life of these batteries is short, and if they arent constantly charging, they wont work when you go to turn on your controller. Overall disappointing, but not the worst. Stick to corded play.
customer_reviews.author: Danny B

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever
customer_reviews.text: It takes almost 5 hours for them to charge. The cord is super short and only plugs into a wall adapter with usb. The colors are misleading, when I take them off at green and put them right back on they’re red again. Not super impressed
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey P.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than other model I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how relatively easy it is to situate the controller on the charger effectively. Controller and battery sit positively and securely, and the LEDs make it absolutely clear that the device is charging.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very nice charger!
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this product! It let's you know when your controllers are all charged up and ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for cost
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wish the light didn’t stay on even when not in use. Better then buying high end brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Delince

customer_reviews.title: Great dual charger
customer_reviews.text: It come with batteries that quickly charge in the cradle and so far last hours, The cradle connects to the XBOX one usb in the front to charge and gives a green light when charged.
customer_reviews.author: MCP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. When it works
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very nice but only one of the two battery packs works correctly. The other one, when plugged in the controller, has contact issues as it will constantly stop working and the controller's power goes out. Unfortunately, the link to buy just the battery packs on amazon doesn't work so I can't even replace the pack. So I am screwed if the battery runs out in the middle of playing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and good quality for your buck.👍
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9yr old grandson and he's very happy with it. No more batteries to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for a few months and it still charges well. Nothing bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my second charging station. This was affordable, is solid, and most importantly the slot interface is easy to line up and charges easily with USB connection to run right off of the XBox. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: its a pretty decent charger but my only problem is I have to put the batteries in it just right for the battery to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Branch

customer_reviews.title: I can recommend this product indeed
customer_reviews.text: Battery packs don’t bend when you install them. Nice bright light indicators. Works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: DaBradleys

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last as long as advertisied
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with the product, however, it does not last 30+ hours. We have been seeing about 8-10 hours before it has to be charged.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: Good charger. Design makes it really easy to recharge without having to remove all the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck P.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this I cannot complain. I absolutely love it. If you are looking for something at a great value and is nice I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B. Wegener

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 2 batteries holds a charge
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 of 2 batteries holds a charge. Box was mistakenly destroyed and disposed of or I would send this junk back. Nice design, too bad about the bad battery.
customer_reviews.author: EMP

customer_reviews.title: Saves $$$
customer_reviews.text: This has saved so much money from buying batteries! My 10 year okd set it up so it is very easy to use. Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Guare

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality custom controller
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality customization to a standard Xbox controller. Very well done. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this charging dock he received for his 10th birthday. Easy to use and great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little station
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected but it works fine, charges two controllers, and does light up green and red for battery life .
customer_reviews.author: Yerlene

customer_reviews.title: LED Lights Distracting
customer_reviews.text: Aside from unplugging it I'm not sure if there is a way to disable the lights when there isn't a controller on the charger. They are very bright and always on which makes it distracting for a theatre room. Other than that it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It charges well you just have to get it to sit on the charging station right and far as the battery i been receiving is about 3.5-4hrs before recharging but it still beat buying batteries so im cool and it's great for the price ....and by the way it comes with 2 battery packs.....if you want some better spend more but once again it suits my needs just fine
customer_reviews.author: Drush

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great product
customer_reviews.text: The battery packs are a little loose on the controller so the Xbox One thinks you're losing battery when you aren't sometimes. It isn't a constant issue and doesn't really interfere with game play, just a bit of an annoyance. Overall, a pretty good product though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Lights NEVER turn off
customer_reviews.text: The lights stay on even when there is no controller on. This takes it from a 5 star review to a 1 star, who wants lights that are on all the time?
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Very simple, just plug the charger into the USB port and set your controller on top.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie S.

product_meta.title: Sliq Xbox One/One X/One S Dual Controller Charger Charging Station and Battery Pack - Includes 2 Rechargeable Batteries - Also Compatible with Elite and PC Versions (Black)
feature_bullets: MORE GAME TIME, LESS TIME HUNTING FOR BATTERIES - Say Goodbye to AA Batteries forever! Enjoy up to 35 Hours of Game Play. With the Sliq Xbox One Controller Charger Station, you'll ALWAYS have a fresh set of new batteries ready to go. Charges up to two batteries at the same time.
MULTI-COMPATIBILITY - Compatible with Xbox One Original, Xbox One S, Xbox One X and Xbox One Elite Controllers
SMART CHARGING - Once batteries are fully charged, batteries will switch to idle mode. Preserving the lifespan of the battery. Lasts up to 1000 recharging cycles!
CHARGING INDICATOR- Features a built-in red/green LED light indicating charging status. INCLUDES: 1 Charging Dock, 2 800 mAH Rechargeable Battery Pack, 1 Micro USB Cable

✔ WE'VE GOT YOU COVERED - All Sliq Gaming products come with a 1-Year Replacement Warranty. Register your product to receive an additional 6 months of coverage! We've got you covered if anything goes wrong. We are a USA based company.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,044 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
